Title: Prevents the financial exploitation of older and vulnerable adults
Summary: Allows for investment advisers and firms to disclose potential financial exploitation of elderly and vulnerable adults to the commissioner of the department of financial services and to halt disbursements from an account if an adviser or firm believes that financial exploitation is occurring.
LawCode: Add ยง359-eeee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to preventing the financial exploitation of older and vulnerable adults
